projects.title: Kold festival
projects.content: Website for the Kold Festival organization. Using the Vue.js framework and Sanity.io CMS, we created a user-friendly and visually appealing website to provide festival-goers with all the information they needed.

projects.title: Asentrum
projects.content: As part of my final exam as a multimedia designer, I created a prototype for an intranet application for the company Asento. Using Vue.js, Firebase and Sass, I created user friendly dashboard. Despite not being a completed project (requires some RWD adjustments and functionality), I view it as a personal success, because i learned so much.

projects.title: Task management app
projects.content: Task Management App, built with React.js, is a to-do list tool that helps users stay organized. In the future updates, i'd like to include Pomodoro timer and calendar integration.

projects.title: Weather Forecast App
projects.content: This project involved working with a REST API to display current weather data for a user-specified location. Interface displays information such as temperature, humidity, and wind speed. Project's not mobile optimized.
